```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv("data.csv",skip = 1)

df_clean <- df %>% select(2:dim(df)[2]) %>% rename("Type" = "...2")
```

```{r}
df_long <- df_clean %>% pivot_longer(names_to = "Year",
                                     values_to = "Percentage",cols = 2:5)
```


```{r}
pl1 <- ggplot(data= df_long, aes(x = Year,y = Percentage,group = Type,color = Type)) +
  geom_line() + theme_minimal() + geom_point() + geom_text(aes(label = Percentage),
                                                           vjust = -0.5) + labs(x = "Year",
                                                                                y = "Percentage automation trend (%)",color = "Payment method") + theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 6))
pl1 + guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(label = c(""))))
```
